title: TEST of Jira email integration
description: Test issue to experiement with jira email integration.

comments.author: Chris Hostetter (Unused)
comments.content:
[[ Old comment, sent from unregistered email on Tue, 17 Oct 2006 10:07:04 -0700 (PDT) ]]


Test reply to a jira generated email with some quoted text left in the
mail (using non-standard quoting)

: Test issue to experiement with jira email integration.
:
: –
: This message is automatically generated by JIRA.
: -
: If you think it was sent incorrectly contact one of the administrators: http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/Administrators.jspa
: -
: For more information on JIRA, see: http://www.atlassian.com/software/jira



-Hoss

comments.author: Chris Hostetter (Unused)
comments.content:
[[ Old comment, sent from unregistered email on Tue, 17 Oct 2006 10:07:36 -0700 (PDT) ]]



Test reply to a jira generated email with some quoted text left in the
mail (using standard quoting)

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content:
[[ Old comment, sent from unregistered email on Tue, 17 Oct 2006 13:10:26 -0400 ]]

Replying via solr-dev. the original header only had
Reply-To: solr-dev@lucene.apache.org
and I manually replaced solr-dev with jira@apache.org while replying.

-Yonik

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: haven't done anything with this in a while, and i want an issue to test resolving with, so bye bye SOLR-55
